entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
